name: Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: Flagship smartphone with advanced camera and 5G capabilities, offering a stunning design and exceptional performance for photography and multitasking.

name: Galaxy M14
description: Budget-friendly phone with a large display, solid performance, and reliable features for everyday use.

name: Galaxy Z Fold 5
description: Premium foldable phone with cutting-edge design, multitasking capabilities, and a revolutionary display for tech enthusiasts.

name: Redmi Note 13 Pro
description: High-performance phone with a sleek design, powerful processor, and advanced camera capabilities for photo enthusiasts.

name: Redmi Note 10 Pro
description: Popular mid-range smartphone featuring a 108MP camera, AMOLED display, and impressive battery life for an excellent multimedia experience.

name: Redmi A2 Plus
description: Entry-level smartphone with essential features for everyday use, designed for affordability without compromising functionality.

name: Realme C53
description: Affordable smartphone with decent performance, a long-lasting battery, and a sleek build for everyday convenience.

name: Realme GT 3
description: Flagship phone with a futuristic design, high-speed charging, and top-notch performance for power users and gamers.

name: Realme 12 Pro+
description: Premium smartphone with a 200MP ultra-clear camera, AMOLED display, and lightning-fast charging for an unparalleled user experience.

name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: Premium flagship with the latest A17 Bionic chip, titanium body, and advanced camera system for photography and videography.

name: iPhone 15
description: Latest iPhone with Dynamic Island, impressive battery life, and the latest innovations in design and technology.

name: iPhone 14 Plus
description: Large display iPhone with excellent battery life, high-quality camera, and powerful performance for all-day productivity.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: Advanced smartwatch with a powerful S9 chip, always-on Retina display, enhanced health tracking, and seamless integration with the Apple ecosystem.

name: Galaxy Watch 6 Classic
description: Premium smartwatch featuring a rotating bezel, AMOLED display, advanced fitness tracking, and long battery life for a seamless experience.

name: Garmin Fenix 7X
description: High-end multisport GPS smartwatch with rugged design, solar charging, detailed health metrics, and extensive activity tracking for outdoor enthusiasts.

name: Fitbit Sense 2
description: Health-focused smartwatch with advanced stress management tools, heart health insights, and sleep tracking for holistic wellness management.

name: Apple MagSafe Battery Pack
description: Compact and convenient 1460mAh power bank designed for MagSafe-compatible iPhones, offering seamless attachment and reliable on-the-go charging.

name: Redmi Power Bank 20000mAh
description: High-capacity power bank with dual USB output, fast charging support, and durable design, ideal for powering devices multiple times during travel.

name: Samsung Wireless Power Bank 10000mAh
description: Sleek and versatile power bank with wireless charging capabilities, USB-C fast charging support, and a premium build for Samsung devices and more.

name: Apple AirPods Max
description: Premium over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation, spatial audio, and a custom acoustic design for an immersive listening experience.

name: Redmi SonicBass Wireless Earphones
description: Affordable wireless earphones with deep bass, noise isolation, and long battery life, perfect for everyday music and calls.

name: Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro
description: True wireless earbuds with intelligent active noise cancellation, crisp sound quality, and a comfortable fit for all-day use.
